Bounce House.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap now deals 600 damage and knocks up enemies within 20 units of where you land.

Bulk Up.card_desc: [Recovery] Recovery heals for an additional 600 instantly and increases your maximum Health by 300 for 5s.

Bully.card_desc: [Net Shot] Gain {scale=12|12}% lifesteal against targets you hit with Net Shot.

Concussion.card_desc: [Net Shot] Reduce the cooldown of Net Shot by {scale=1|1}s.

Deep Breath.card_desc: [Recovery] Activating Recovery Grants you {scale=6|6}% Damage Reduction for 2s.

Ensnare.card_desc: [Net Shot] Net Shot grants 30% bonus damage for as long as the target is slowed. Lasts a minimum of 2s.

Exhilarate.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heal for {scale=120|120} if you hit a champion with Heroic Leap.

Giga Siphon.card_desc: [Recovery] After Recover ends gain {scale=8|8}% Lifesteal for 4s.

Gotcha.card_desc: [Net Shot] Using Net Shot grants {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s.

Leg Day.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Increase the jump strength of Heroic Leap by {scale=5|5}%

Momentum.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap grants {scale=6|6}% Damage Reduction for 4s.

No Escape.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain {scale=8|8}% movement speed for 8s after getting a Kill.

Rapid Sustain.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing.

Reconstruction.card_desc: [Recovery] Reduce the cooldown of Recovery by {scale=1|1}s.

Seismic Wave.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Reduce the Cooldown of Heroic Leap by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Stomping Ground.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce active cooldowns by {scale=15|15}% when you get a Kill.

Tangled.card_desc: [Net Shot] Increase the duration of Net Shot by {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recovery] Activating Recovery generates 1 Ammo every 0.5s for {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Aufgepumpt.card_desc: [Erholung] Erholung heilt sofort 600 LP zusätzlich und deine maximale Gesundheit erhöht sich 5s lang um 300 LP.

Aufheiterung.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Triffst du einen Champion mit Heldensatz, wirst du {scale=120|120} LP geheilt.

Beintag.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Erhöht die Sprungkraft von Heldensatz um {scale=5|5}%.

Durchatmen.card_desc: [Erholung] Nach Aktivierung von Erholung wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Eingewickelt.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Erhöht die Dauer von Netzschuss um {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Ersch\u00fctterung.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Netzschuss um {scale=1|1}s.

Erwischt.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Netzschuss erhöht dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Gigasauger.card_desc: [Erholung] Gewährt nach dem Ende von Erholung 4s lang {scale=8|8}% Lebensraub.

H\u00fcpfburg.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Heldensatz verursacht 600 Schaden und stößt Gegner im Umkreis von 20 Einheiten um deinen Landepunkt nach oben.

Kein Ausweg.card_desc: [Waffe] Kills erhöhen dein Lauftempo 8s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Momentum.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Nach Verwendung von Heldensatz wird erlittener Schaden 4s lang um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Schnellerhaltung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Seismische Welle.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Heldensatz um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Tummelplatz.card_desc: [Waffe] Kill reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=15|15}%.

Tyrann.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Gewährt nach Treffern mit Netzschuss {scale=12|12}% Lebensraub gegen diese Ziele.

Verstrickt.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Solange ein Ziel durch Netzschuss verlangsamt ist, fügst du ihm 30% mehr Schaden zu. Hält mindestens 2s an.

Vitalit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Erholung] Die Aktivierung von Erholung erzeugt {scale=0.5|0.5}s lang alle 0,5s 1 Munition.

Wiederaufbau.card_desc: [Erholung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Erholung um {scale=1|1}s.

Athl\u00e9tique.card_desc: [Récupération] Récupération rend instantanément 600 PV de plus, et augmente vos PV max. de 300 pendant 5s.

Balayeur.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Bonds et rebonds.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Bond héroïque inflige 600 dégâts et projette les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 20 unités autour de votre zone d'atterrissage.

Commotion.card_desc: [Tir filet] Tir Filet se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Euphorie.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Si Bond héroïque touche un champion, vous regagnez {scale=120|120} PV.

Filet emm\u00eal\u00e9.card_desc: [Tir filet] Vous infligez 30% de dégâts supplémentaires aux cibles ralenties par Tir filet. L'effet dure au minimum 2s.

Foul\u00e9e.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Le saut de Bond héroïque est {scale=5|5}% plus puissant.

Giga-siphon.card_desc: [Récupération] Après Récupération, vous obtenez {scale=8|8}% de drain de vie pendant 4s.

Impulsion.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Bond héroïque réduit les dégâts subis de {scale=6|6}% pendant 4s.

Maille double.card_desc: [Tir filet] Tir filet dure {scale=0.3|0.3}s de plus.

Pas d'\u00e9chappatoire.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque exécution augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 8s.

Pers\u00e9cution.card_desc: [Tir filet] Vous obtenez {scale=12|12}% de drain de vie contre la cible affectée par Tir filet.

Pi\u00e9tinement.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque exécution réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=15|15}%.

Pris au pi\u00e8ge.card_desc: [Tir filet] Tir filet augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Respiration.card_desc: [Récupération] Activer Récupération réduit de {scale=6|6}% les dégâts que vous subissez pendant 2s.

Soutien instantan\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] En-dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

Vague sismique.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Bond héroïque se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Vigueur.card_desc: [Récupération] Activer Récupération redonne 1 munition toutes les 0,5s pendant {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

\u4e0b\u80a2\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 增加英勇跳跃的距离{scale=5|5}%

\u518d\u751f\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [战斗回复] 除基础效果外还会立即回复600点生命值，且在使用后5秒内最大生命值提高300点

\u529b\u91cf\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [捕网射击] 普通攻击命中已被捕网射击减速的目标伤害提高30%

\u52a8\u80fd\u8f6c\u5316.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 使用英勇跳跃后4秒内，获得{scale=6|6}%伤害减免

\u5f3a\u529b\u8679\u5438.card_desc: [战斗回复] 回复后4秒内获得{scale=8|8}%的生命偷取效果

\u5feb\u901f\u7eed\u822a.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于50%时，你受到的治疗效果将会增加{scale=10|10}%

\u6043\u5f3a\u51cc\u5f31.card_desc: [捕网射击] 攻击捕网射击命中的目标时获得{scale=12|12}%的生命偷取效果

\u6218\u4e89\u8df5\u8e0f.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人将使你所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=15|15}%

\u6293\u6355\u9ad8\u624b.card_desc: [捕网射击] 使用捕网射击将使你的移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续3秒

\u632f\u594b.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 英勇跳跃若命中一个敌人，自身回复{scale=120|120}点生命值

\u65e0\u5904\u53ef\u9003.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人将使你的移动速度增加{scale=8|8}%，持续8秒

\u6d3b\u529b.card_desc: [战斗恢复] 使用战斗恢复后{scale=0.5|0.5}秒内，每0.5秒获得1发弹药

\u6df1\u547c\u5438.card_desc: [战斗恢复] 回复后3秒内获得{scale=8|8}%的伤害减免

\u6e05\u9053\u592b.card_desc: [武器] 弹药装填速度增加{scale=5|5}%

\u7ec6\u80de\u91cd\u7ec4.card_desc: [战斗回复] 战斗回复的冷却时间减少{scale=1|1}秒

\u7f20\u7ed5.card_desc: [捕网射击] 增加减速的持续时间{scale=0.3|0.3}秒

\u8df3\u8dc3\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 英勇跳跃现在会对落点20码范围内的敌人造成600点伤害和击飞效果

\u9707\u8361\u51b2\u51fb.card_desc: [捕网射击] 减少捕网射击的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

Contusi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Disparo de red] Su recarga se reduce en {scale=1|1} s.

El peor d\u00eda.card_desc: [Salto heroico] La potencia del salto aumenta un {scale=5|5}%.

Mara\u00f1a.card_desc: [Disparo de red] Aumentas su duración en {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Muscular.card_desc: [Recuperación] Recuperación cura 600 PS adicionales instantáneamente y aumenta tu salud máxima en 300 PS durante 5s.

Onda s\u00edsmica.card_desc: [Salto heroico] Reduce la recarga de Salto heroico en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Respiraci\u00f3n profunda.card_desc: [Recuperación] Otorga un {scale=6|6}% de reducción de daño durante 2 s al activarlo.

Sif\u00f3n Giga.card_desc: [Recuperación] Obtienes un {scale=8|8}% de robo de vida durante 4s.

Sin escapatoria.card_desc: [Arma] Ganas un {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 8s tras una baja.

Suelo pisoteado.card_desc: [Arma] Las recargas activas se reducen un {scale=15|15}% tras una eliminación.

Sustento r\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación aumenta si tienes menos de un 50 % recibes un aumento de curación de un {scale=5|5}%.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recuperación] Al activar Recuperación, recuperas 1 de munición cada 0,5s durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Concuss\u00e3o.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Reduz o intervalo do Disparo de Rede em {scale=1|1}s.

Emaranhado.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Aumenta a duração do Disparo de Rede em {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Enredado.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Disparo de Rede dá 30% de dano adicional enquanto o alvo estiver desacelerado. Dura no mínimo 2s.

Entusiasmado.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Reduz o intervalo do Salto Heroico em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

\u00cdmpeto.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Salto Heroico concede {scale=6|6}% de redução de dano por 4s.

Onda S\u00edsmica.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Cura {scale=120|120} se você acertar um Campeão com o Salto Heroico.

P\u00e9 no Ch\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz os intervalos ativos em {scale=15|15}% após conseguir uma eliminação.

Peguei voc\u00ea!.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Usar o Disparo de Rede concede {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 3s.

Pula-pula.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Salto Heroico agora causa 600 de dano e joga ao ar inimigos que estiverem a 20 unidades de onde você cair.

Reconstru\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Recuperação] Reduz o intervalo da Recuperação em {scale=1|1}s.

Regenera\u00e7\u00e3o R\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=5|5}% mais cura quando estiver abaixo de 50% de vida.

Sem Escapat\u00f3ria.card_desc: [Arma] Ganha {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento por 8s após conseguir uma eliminação.

Super Sif\u00e3o.card_desc: [Recuperação] Depois de usar Recuperação ganha {scale=8|8}% de roubo de vida por 4s.

Trabalhando Perna.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Aumenta a força do Salto Heroico em {scale=5|5}%.

Valent\u00e3o.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Ganha {scale=12|12}% de roubo de vida dos alvos do Disparo de Rede.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recuperação] Ativar Recuperação gera 1 de munição a cada 0,5s durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Vitaminado.card_desc: [Recuperação] Recuperação cura um adicional de 600 instantaneamente e aumenta sua vida máxima em 300 por 5s.

\u0411\u043e\u0434\u0440\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Терапия] Активация Терапии генерирует 1 боеприпас каждые 0,5 с. в течение {scale=0.5|0.5} c.

\u0411\u0443\u0433\u0430\u0439.card_desc: [Терапия] Терапия мгновенно исцеляет вас еще на 600 ед. Ваше максимальное здоровье увеличивается на 300 ед. на 5 с.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u0412\u043e\u043e\u0434\u0443\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=120|120} ед. за каждого чемпиона, задетого Героическим скачком.

\u0413\u0438\u0433\u0430\u0441\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Терапия] По окончании действия Терапии вы получаете {scale=8|8}% вампиризма на 4 с.

\u0413\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043e\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Терапия] После активации Терапии вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

\u0414\u0440\u043e\u0436\u044c \u0437\u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Убийства сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0417\u0430\u0434\u0438\u0440\u0430.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Вы получаете {scale=12|12}% вампиризма против врагов, пораженных Выстрелом сетью.

\u0418\u043d\u0435\u0440\u0446\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Героический скачок уменьшает входящий урон на {scale=6|6}% на 4 с.

\u041d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Сила Героического скачка увеличивается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041d\u0430\u0434\u0443\u0432\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Героический скачок наносит 600 ед. урона и подбрасывает врагов в радиусе 20 метров от вашей точки приземления.

\u041d\u0435\u0442 \u0432\u044b\u0445\u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Убийства увеличивают скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 8 с.

\u041f\u043e\u043f\u0430\u043b\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Использование Выстрела сетью увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u041f\u0443\u0442\u044b.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Длительность Выстрела сетью увеличивается на {scale=0.3|0.3} с.

\u0421\u0435\u0439\u0441\u043c\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Перезарядка Героического скачка сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u043a\u0438.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Выстрел сетью наносит на 30% больше урона, пока цель замедлена. Эффект длится минимум 2 с.

\u0421\u043e\u0442\u0440\u044f\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Перезарядка Выстрела сетью сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

Bez wyj\u015bcia.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 8 s po udanym zabójstwie.

B\u0142yskawiczna reakcja.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 50%, twoje leczenie wzrasta o {scale=5|5}%.

Fala sejsmiczna.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Skraca czas odnowienia Heroicznego wyskoku o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Giga syfon.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Zapewnia {scale=8|8}% kradzieży życia przez 4 s po zakończeniu Regeneracji.

G\u0142\u0119boki oddech.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Aktywacja Regeneracji zapewnia {scale=6|6}% redukcji obrażeń na 2 s.

Impet.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Heroiczny wyskok przyznaje {scale=6|6}% redukcji obrażeń na 4 s.

Kulturysta.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Regeneracja przywraca natychmiast dodatkowe 600 PZ, a twoje maks. zdrowie zwiększa się o 300 PZ na 5 s.

\u0141obuz.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Zapewnia {scale=12|12}% kradzieży życia przeciw celom trafionym Strzałem siecią.

Mam ci\u0119!.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Strzał siecią zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Od\u017cycie.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Przywraca {scale=120|120} PZ, jeśli trafisz czempiona Heroicznym wyskokiem.

Praca n\u00f3g.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Zwiększa zasięg Heroicznego wyskoku o {scale=5|5}%.

Rekonstrukcja.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Skraca czas odnowienia Regeneracji o {scale=1|1} s.

Rewir.card_desc: [Broń] Skraca aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=15|15}% po udanym zabójstwie.

Trampolina.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Heroiczny wyskok zadaje teraz 600 obrażeń i wyrzuca w powietrze wrogów w promieniu 20 jedn. od miejsca twojego lądowania.

Usidlenie.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Strzał siecią zapewnia 30% dodatkowych obrażeń podczas spowolnienia celu. Trwa maks. 2 s.

Wigor.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Aktywacja Regeneracji generuje 1 szt. amunicji co 0,5 s przez {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Wstrz\u0105s.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Skraca czas odnowienia Strzału siecią o {scale=1|1} s.

Zapl\u0105tanie.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Zwiększa czas trwania Strzału siecią o {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Bacak Egzersizi.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış'ın zıplama gücünü %{scale=5|5} artır.

Co\u015ftur.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış ile bir şampiyonu vurursan {scale=120|120} Can iyileşirsin.

Derin Nefes.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma'yı etkinleştirmek 2 sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} Hasar Azaltma verir.

Dev Hortum.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma bittikten sonra 4 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Can Çalma kazan.

Din\u00e7lik.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma'yı etkinleştirmek {scale=0.5|0.5}.5.5 sn boyunca her 0,5 saniyede 1 Cephane oluşturur.

G\u00fc\u00e7len.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma, anında 600 Can iyileştirir ve maksimum Canını 5 saniyeliğine 300 artırır.

\u0130vme.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış, 4 saniye boyunca %{scale=6|6} Hasar Azaltma verir.

Kabaday\u0131.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı ile vurduğun hedeflere karşı %{scale=12|12} Can Çalma kazan.

Ka\u00e7\u0131\u015f Yok.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Katletme yaptıktan sonra 8 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Kapan.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı, hedef yavaşlatılmış olduğu sürece %30 bonus hasar verir. En az 2 sn sürer.

Karma\u015f\u0131k.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı'nın süresini {scale=0.3|0.3} sn artır.

Sars\u0131nt\u0131.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Sismik Dalga.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalt.

U\u011frak Mekan.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Katletme yaptığında aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=15|15} azalt.

Yakalad\u0131m.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı kullanmak 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı verir.

Z\u0131plama Evi.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış artık 600 hasar veriyor ve indiğin yerin 20 birim dahilindeki düşmanları itiyor.
